channel.title: 508/517/525 Random PvP Drops (Almost Realistic)

item.title: 508/517/525 Random PvP Drops (Almost Realistic)
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:7, topic:528498”][quote author=Docent link=topic=647246.msg4353212#msg4353212 date=1377028845]

This is a very bad way to do it and very poorly coded.

How would you code it smarty pants.
[/quote]
First of all, improve your naming.

                           public static int PotDrop() {

Could be

                           public static int getPotDrop() {

^ However I am not a fan of that.

I suggest you redo the whole entire system. This can all be done is one method. Make it enum based.

public enum KillType {
	Low,
	MEDIUM,
	HIGH
	VERY_HIGH
}

Imo, for something like this, I wouldn’t use getters, but would randomize them in the method when they are called.

Also, instead of that big if statement, I suggest using a switch statement. Base the switch on the enum.[/quote]

Thank you arham. That was really a good suggestion. Although I have already implemented my way into the server, I will gladly use your idea the next time.

Read full topic

item.title: 508/517/525 Random PvP Drops (Almost Realistic)
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Docent, post:5, topic:528498”][quote author=Arcik link=topic=647246.msg4353204#msg4353204 date=1377028160]
This is a very bad way to do it and very poorly coded.
[/quote]

How would you code it smarty pants.[/quote]
First of all, improve your naming.

                           public static int PotDrop() {

Could be

                           public static int getPotDrop() {

^ However I am not a fan of that.

I suggest you redo the whole entire system. This can all be done is one method. Make it enum based.

public enum KillType {
	Low,
	MEDIUM,
	HIGH
	VERY_HIGH
}

Imo, for something like this, I wouldn’t use getters, but would randomize them in the method when they are called.

Also, instead of that big if statement, I suggest using a switch statement. Base the switch on the enum.

Read full topic

item.title: 508/517/525 Random PvP Drops (Almost Realistic)
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

So much redundancy.if (combatLevel <= 25 && combatLevel < 50) { Engine.items.createGroundItem(LowLvlKill(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username); Engine.items.createGroundItem(LowLvlKill(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username); Engine.items.createGroundItem(FoodDrop3(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username); } else if (combatLevel >= 50 && combatLevel < 75) { Engine.items.createGroundItem(MedLvlKill(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username); Engine.items.createGroundItem(MedLvlKill(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username); Engine.items.createGroundItem(RareDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username); Engine.items.createGroundItem(PotDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username); Engine.items.createGroundItem(FoodDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username); } else if (combatLevel >= 75 && combatLevel < 110) { Engine.items.createGroundItem(HighLvlKill(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username); Engine.items.createGroundItem(HighLvlKill(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username); Engine.items.createGroundItem(RareDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username); Engine.items.createGroundItem(PotDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username); Engine.items.createGroundItem(FoodDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username); } else if (combatLevel >= 110) { Engine.items.createGroundItem(VeryHighLvlKill(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username); Engine.items.createGroundItem(VeryHighLvlKill(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username); Engine.items.createGroundItem(HighLvlKill(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username); Engine.items.createGroundItem(RareDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username); Engine.items.createGroundItem(PotDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username); Engine.items.createGroundItem(FoodDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username); } Engine.items.createGroundItem(PotDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username); Engine.items.createGroundItem(FoodDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username); This reduces it a little, but it still looks atrocious.

item.title: 508/517/525 Random PvP Drops (Almost Realistic)
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

This was used on a 525 CodeUsa base. It should work on 90% of other 508/517/525 sources.

Details = A combat level based drop system. Each combat level chunk such as level 3 - 50, get their loot and the one before it. For example: “Docent (level:126)” kills “Nocent (level:126)”. Docent’s drop array would include that of a level 34’s, a level 54’s, a level 81’s, and his own chunk. Also, any player above level 50 has a chance at a PvP item like Vesta’s Chainbody, Corrupt dragon battleaxe, etc.

Difficulty = 1/10 (simple cut and paste) 3/10 (if server isn’t formatted like this)
Purpose = Add a PvP drop system similar to RuneScape during the 508-525 revisions.

NOTE : THERE IS NO EP. PLEASE DO NOT THINK THAT THIS IS EARNING POTENTIAL BASED.

Alright first of all go to Player.java and add this under all of the variable statements. (under the “private static int combatLevel” for example.

[code=java] public static int PotDrop() {
return PotDrop[(int)(Math.random()*PotDrop.length)];
}
public static int RareDrop() {
return RareDrop[(int)(Math.random()*RareDrop.length)];
}
public static int PotDrop2() {
return PotDrop2[(int)(Math.random()*PotDrop2.length)];
}

public static int Food[] = {379, 385, 391, 3144, 373, 361, 333};

			public static int Food2[] = {379, 385, 391, 3144, 373, 361, 333};
			public static int Food3[] = {379, 385, 391, 3144, 373, 361, 333};
			public static int Food4[] = {379, 385, 391, 3144, 373, 361, 333};

			public static int Food7[] = {379, 385, 391, 3144, 373, 361, 333};

			 public static int LowLvlKill [] = {1725, 1725, 1725, 1727, 1727, 1727, 1729, 1729, 1729, 1729, 1731, 115, 123, 121, 133, 145, 139, 141, 147, 131, 157, 159, 161, 163, 165, 167, 169, 171, 173, 175, 177};
			 public static int MedLvlKill [] = {1725, 2491, 2497, 2495, 2493, 1163, 1161, 1159, 1131, 1133, 1119, 5574, 662, 121, 133, 145, 139, 141, 147, 131, 12941, 159, 161, 163, 12934, 167, 169, 171, 173, 175, 177, 12899, 6528};	
			 public static int HighLvlKill [] = {1725, 2491, 2497, 2495, 2493, 1163, 1161, 1159, 1131, 1133, 1119, 5574, 662, 121, 133, 145, 139, 141, 147, 131, 12941, 159, 161, 163, 12934, 167, 169, 171, 173, 175, 177, 12899, 5698, 1434, 1149, 1127, 1079, 1073, 1113, 5633, 5641, 5666, 5667, 6528, 4089, 4091, 4093, 4095, 4097, 4099, 4101, 4103, 4105, 4107, 4109, 4111, 4113, 4115, 4117, 4129, 11732};	
			 public static int VeryHighLvlKill [] = {1725, 2491, 2497, 2495, 2493, 1163, 1161, 1159, 1131, 1133, 1119, 5574, 662, 121, 133, 145, 139, 141, 147, 131, 12941, 159, 161, 163, 12934, 167, 169, 171, 173, 175, 177, 12899, 5698, 1434, 1149, 1127, 1079, 1073, 1113, 5633, 5641, 5666, 5667, 3479, 3478, 3480, 4992, 4860, 4866, 4872, 4878, 4884, 4890, 4896, 4902, 4908, 4914, 4920, 4926, 4932, 4938, 4944, 4950, 4998, 11732,379, 385, 391, 3144, 373, 361, 333,379, 385, 391, 3144, 373, 361, 333,379, 385, 391, 3144, 373, 361, 333,379, 385, 391, 3144, 373, 361, 333,379, 385, 391, 3144, 373, 361, 333,379, 385, 391, 3144, 373, 361, 333,379, 385, 391, 3144, 373, 361, 333,379, 385, 391, 3144, 373, 361, 333,379, 385, 391, 3144, 373, 361, 333,379, 385, 391, 3144, 373, 361, 333,379, 385, 391, 3144, 373, 361, 333,379, 385, 391, 3144, 373, 361, 333,379, 385, 391, 3144, 373, 361, 333,379, 385, 391, 3144, 373, 361, 333,379, 385, 391, 3144, 373, 361, 333,379, 385, 391, 3144, 373, 361, 333,379, 385, 391, 3144, 373, 361, 333,379, 385, 391, 3144, 373, 361, 333,379, 385, 391, 3144, 373, 361, 333,379, 385, 391, 3144, 373, 361, 333,379, 385, 391, 3144, 373, 361, 333};	
			
			
			
				public static int LowLvlKill() {
						return LowLvlKill[(int)(Math.random()*LowLvlKill.length)];
					}

							}
								public static int HighLvlKill() {
										return HighLvlKill[(int)(Math.random()*HighLvlKill.length)];
									}
										public static int VeryHighLvlKill() {

											}		
			public static int FoodDrop() {
					return Food[(int)(Math.random()*Food.length)];
				}
					public static int FoodDrop2() {

												}[/code]

Alright? Now, the 8 different food types, I realized, were pointless but I kept them in. DONT FLAME I KNOW.

Now, go the place in Player.java where it says “Oh dear, you have died!”, or basically the death method. Then add this underneath " Engine.items.createGroundItem(526, 1, absX, absY, heightLevel, opp.username);"

[code=java]if (combatLevel <= 25 && combatLevel < 50) {
Engine.items.createGroundItem(LowLvlKill(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username);
Engine.items.createGroundItem(LowLvlKill(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username);
Engine.items.createGroundItem(FoodDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username);
Engine.items.createGroundItem(PotDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username);
Engine.items.createGroundItem(FoodDrop3(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username);

					} else if (combatLevel >= 50 && combatLevel < 75) {
						Engine.items.createGroundItem(MedLvlKill(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username);
						Engine.items.createGroundItem(MedLvlKill(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username);
						Engine.items.createGroundItem(FoodDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username);
						Engine.items.createGroundItem(FoodDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username);
						Engine.items.createGroundItem(FoodDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username);
						Engine.items.createGroundItem(PotDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username);
						Engine.items.createGroundItem(PotDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username);
						Engine.items.createGroundItem(RareDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username);
						
					} else if (combatLevel >= 75 && combatLevel < 110) {
						Engine.items.createGroundItem(HighLvlKill(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username);
						Engine.items.createGroundItem(HighLvlKill(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username);
						Engine.items.createGroundItem(RareDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username);
						Engine.items.createGroundItem(FoodDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username);
						Engine.items.createGroundItem(FoodDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username);
						Engine.items.createGroundItem(PotDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username);
						Engine.items.createGroundItem(PotDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username);
						
					} else if (combatLevel >= 110) {
						Engine.items.createGroundItem(VeryHighLvlKill(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username);
						Engine.items.createGroundItem(VeryHighLvlKill(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username);
						
						Engine.items.createGroundItem(HighLvlKill(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username);
						Engine.items.createGroundItem(RareDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username);
						Engine.items.createGroundItem(FoodDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username);
						Engine.items.createGroundItem(FoodDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username);
						Engine.items.createGroundItem(PotDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username);
						Engine.items.createGroundItem(PotDrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, opp.username);
					}[/code]

THIS SHOULD WORK, if these methods and variables are not the same as your servers. Please change them to match your servers or else it WONT work.

That was it. Short and Simple.

Here is what it should look like:

2unypt5.png759×504

COMBOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

lol. thanks for reading
Feel free to leave a comment. OR ask for help if it didn’t work for you.

-Docent
